snippet.title: SimCity BuildIt Gameplay Trailer | Coming Holidays 2014
snippet.description:
Build, craft, and control! This all-new SimCity game—designed just for mobile—is coming to the App Store and Google Play during the 2014 holiday season. The key to your city awaits!

With countless buildings and vivid, 3D-quality graphics, SimCity BuildIt is the most realistic city builder on mobile. Create and trade resources with friends and other cities. Unlock exclusive buildings or unleash natural (and not so natural) disasters!

Watch your city come to life, Mayor!

Website: http://www.simcity-buildit.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SimCityBuildIt
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimCityBuildIt
